definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: sandal, boot of soldier (prob. loan-word from As. šênu, shoe, sandal (of leather), Dl:HWB 634 Wkl:Tel Amarna, Gloss., whence (denom.) šênu, put on sandals Dl:l. c.; cf. Aram. [[סֵינׇא]], s0uwno0, suwno0 sandal (vb. denom. se0n); Eth. 340n: sandal);—prob. cstr. [[כָּל־סְאוֹן סׂאֵן]] Is 9:4 every boot of one tramping (abs. Du al).
